title: Business Development Representative
job_overview:
Location: Work from Home
Hours: USA Business Hours
Contractor Requirements: Must have own computer with good specs, stable internet, and a quiet workspace.


About the Role:
SmithDigital is seeking a Business Development Representative (BDR) to generate leads and book meetings for our clients. The BDR will be responsible for outbound prospecting, cold outreach, and lead qualification.

Key Responsibilities:
- Conduct outbound prospecting via email, LinkedIn, and calls.
- Qualify and nurture leads, setting up meetings for clients.
- Use CRM tools to track leads and manage pipelines.
- Personalize outreach messages and follow up with prospects.
- Maintain strong relationships with potential clients.

Requirements:
1+ year of experience in sales, lead generation, or BDR roles.
Strong written and verbal communication skills.
Experience with CRM platforms (HubSpot preferred).
Self-motivated, goal-oriented, and able to work independently.
Experience in B2B outreach is a plus.
